EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Step Forward Information Evening reminder
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.PG_first_name__c} {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.PG_surname__c} and {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
You have been invited to a Step Forward Information Evening.
This is a great opportunity for you to meet the team and find out important information about the programme. It will also give you a chance to ask any questions you might have.
We would love to see you there. Please fill in the form here letting us know whether or not you can attend.
Below you will find information regarding venue, date and what time you should arrive.
Venue
Globe Academy, Harper Road, Southwark, SE1 6AG
Date
26th February 2015
Time
Arrive 6.30pm for a 6.45pm start
Getting there
Tube
Elephant & Castle (Northern / Bakerloo lines - Zone 1 / 2)
Borough (Northern line)
Exit Elephant & Castle tube station and progress through the main subway (which surrounds the roundabout).
Exit the subway onto the New Kent Road exit and progress down the New Kent Road.
Turn left onto Harper Road (opposite Kwik Fit).
The venue entrance is on the right hand side after the side street, the sign on the venue shows Reception / Sports Hall / Deliveries entrance. Once passing through, proceed through the orange doors and follow the corridor round to the upper Pentagon Hall.
Visit: www.tfl.gov.uk for travel info
Entrance on foot
Please use the Harper Road entrance (Globe Academy). Directions as above (from Elephant & Castle) or use appropriate maps to the venue.
Parking
Nearest parking is available on Harper Road and nearby side streets.
We very much look forward to meeting you.
Step Forward
